css_value: body.maxi-blocks--active #column-maxi-afb3d385-u{box-shadow:0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-8,9,60,88),1);padding-left:15px;width:100%;flex-basis:100%;min-width:initial;justify-content:center;flex-direction:column;}@media only screen and (min-width:1921px){body.maxi-blocks--active #column-maxi-afb3d385-u{padding-left:22px;}}@media only screen and (max-width:480px){body.maxi-blocks--active #column-maxi-afb3d385-u{padding-left:0px;}}
